markDown.title: File selector
markDown.content:
The File Selector component allows the user to select one or many f from a userâ€™s file system. Either natively using an file input or drag and drop.

![File Selector](/images/components/file-selector/file-selector--browse.svg)

![File Selector](/images/components/file-selector/file-selector--upload.svg)

![File Selector - standard drag 7 drop](/images/components/file-selector/file-selector--upload+drag.svg)

![File Selector - medium drag 7 drop](/images/components/file-selector/file-selector--upload+drag-medium.svg)

![File Selector - large drag 7 drop](/images/components/file-selector/file-selector--upload+drag-large.svg)

![File Selector - example](/images/components/file-selector/file-selector--example.svg)

![File Selector - example2](/images/components/file-selector/file-selector--example2.svg)
